speech: Our makeup course fees vary by level and duration. For example, the Personal Makeup Artistry course is shorter and more affordable, while the International Master in Ultra Makeup Artistry has a higher fee due to its comprehensive curriculum.

he cost of our makeup programs depends on the course type. Short courses like the 15-day Personal Makeup Artistry program have different fees than extended programs like the 4-month International Diploma in Advanced Makeup Artistry.
